fix_summary.description: Add schema validation in TodoStorage.load() to check each list item is a dict before passing to Todo.from_dict(). This provides defense-in-depth security by catching malformed data with clear error messages at the storage layer.
acceptance_criteria_met: Malformed JSON returns clear error message instead of unhandled exception
Invalid field types (e.g., id as string) are caught at storage level
Missing required fields produce actionable error messages

risks: None identified - all tests pass, ruff checks pass
